jump_scares.spoiler: Accompanied by a loud sound effect, Eveleigh removes her blankets to reveal blood around her pregnant stomach
Eveleigh looks through the peephole in the door and sees a dark hooded figure right by the door. She then turns around and runs into David
There is a loud knock at the door
David suddenly transforms into the hooded figure
Eveleigh turns around and a mannequin is suddenly right behind her
The window suddenly breaks in front of Eveleigh and a few seconds later Eveleigh is pushed to the ground by an unseen force
An apparently dead body suddenly splashes in the water
A blood splatter appears on the wall beside Eveleigh
